page.title: 15N. Bransholme, employment.
page.content: Many of the adult population{(45%) are unemployed at the present time. Those in work are employed in a variety of activities, these include:- banks, factories, Merchant Navy, North Sea oil rigs, school meals, bus and taxi drivers, administrators, welders and painters. Some of those employed have jobs which provide only a limited number of hours a week ie bar attendant, school meals supervisors. None of those interviewed were employed in either the fishing or its ancillary industries, A suprise for what was once Britains Biggest (cost of catch) fishing port. Only 14% of those in work had been employed in the same job for more than 10 years.
